tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reading FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AnomalyDetection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    anomalous_reading FLOAT,
    detection_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SensorData(sensor_id)
);
